trans-unit.source: Displays user interface dialogs that allow you to select and view X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: 显示的用户界面对话框使您可以选择和查看 X.509 证书。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Use the methods of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI> class to present user interface dialogs that display detailed information about an X.509 certificate or allow users to select one or more certificates from a collection of X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: 使用的方法<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI>类存在用户界面对话框显示有关 X.509 证书的详细的信息或允许用户从 X.509 证书的集合中选择一个或多个证书。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to display user interface dialogs to select and view X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何显示用户界面对话框以选择并查看 X.509 证书。

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box that contains the properties of an X.509 certificate and its associated certificate chain.
trans-unit.target: 显示一个对话框，其中包含 X.509 证书及其关联证书链的属性。

trans-unit.source: This method displays a dialog box with detailed information about the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会显示有关指定的 X.509 证书的详细信息的对话框。

trans-unit.source: The dialog box includes buttons for installing or copying the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 该对话框包含用于安装或复制证书时的按钮。

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to display.
trans-unit.target: 要显示的 X.509 证书。

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box that contains the properties of an X.509 certificate and its associated certificate chain.
trans-unit.target: 显示一个对话框，其中包含 X.509 证书及其关联证书链的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.DisplayCertificate%2A> method displays a dialog box with detailed information about the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.DisplayCertificate%2A>方法会显示有关指定的 X.509 证书的详细信息的对话框。

trans-unit.source: The dialog box includes buttons for installing or copying the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 该对话框包含用于安装或复制证书时的按钮。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to display user interface dialogs to select and view X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何显示用户界面对话框以选择并查看 X.509 证书。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="certificate" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="certificate" /> parameter is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> 参数无效。

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to display.
trans-unit.target: 要显示的 X.509 证书。

trans-unit.source: A handle to the parent window to use for the display dialog.
trans-unit.target: 用于显示对话框的父窗口的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box that contains the properties of an X.509 certificate and its associated certificate chain using a handle to a parent window.
trans-unit.target: 使用父窗口的句柄显示一个对话框，其中包含 X.509 证书及其关联证书链的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.DisplayCertificate%2A> method displays a dialog box with detailed information about the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.DisplayCertificate%2A>方法会显示有关指定的 X.509 证书的详细信息的对话框。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to nest dialog boxes that display certificate information.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以用于嵌套显示证书信息的对话框。

trans-unit.source: The dialog box includes buttons for installing or copying the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 该对话框包含用于安装或复制证书时的按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="certificate" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="certificate" /> parameter is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> 参数无效。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box for selecting an X.509 certificate from a certificate collection.
trans-unit.target: 显示一个从证书集合中选择 X.509 证书的对话框。

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you require users to manually select X.509 certificates using a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 如果你要求用户进行手动选择使用对话框中的 X.509 证书，请使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: If no user interaction is required, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果无需用户交互是必需的使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: A collection of X.509 certificates to select from.
trans-unit.target: X.509 证书的集合，从中选择相应的证书。

trans-unit.source: The title of the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 对话框的标题。

trans-unit.source: A descriptive message to guide the user.
trans-unit.target: 指导用户的描述性消息。

trans-unit.source: The message is displayed in the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 该消息显示在对话框中。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SelectionFlag" /> values that specifies whether single or multiple selections are allowed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SelectionFlag" /> 值之一，用于指定允许单项选择还是允许多项选择。

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box for selecting an X.509 certificate from a certificate collection.
trans-unit.target: 显示一个从证书集合中选择 X.509 证书的对话框。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object that contains the selected certificate or certificates.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> 对象，包含选定的一个或多个证书。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.SelectFromCollection%2A> method if you require users to manually select X.509 certificates using a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.SelectFromCollection%2A>方法如果你要求用户以手动选择使用对话框中的 X.509 证书。

trans-unit.source: If no user interaction is required, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果无需用户交互是必需的使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to display user interface dialogs to select and view X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何显示用户界面对话框以选择并查看 X.509 证书。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="selectionFlag" /> parameter is not a valid flag.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="selectionFlag" /> 参数不是有效的标志。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="certificates" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificates" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="certificates" /> parameter is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificates" /> 参数无效。

trans-unit.source: A collection of X.509 certificates to select from.
trans-unit.target: X.509 证书的集合，从中选择相应的证书。

trans-unit.source: The title of the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 对话框的标题。

trans-unit.source: A descriptive message to guide the user.
trans-unit.target: 指导用户的描述性消息。

trans-unit.source: The message is displayed in the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 该消息显示在对话框中。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SelectionFlag" /> values that specifies whether single or multiple selections are allowed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SelectionFlag" /> 值之一，用于指定允许单项选择还是允许多项选择。

trans-unit.source: A handle to the parent window to use for the display dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 用于显示对话框的父窗口的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box for selecting an X.509 certificate from a certificate collection using a handle to a parent window.
trans-unit.target: 使用父窗口的句柄显示一个从证书集合中选择 X.509 证书的对话框。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object that contains the selected certificate or certificates.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> 对象，包含选定的一个或多个证书。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.SelectFromCollection%2A> method if you require users to manually select X.509 certificates using a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.SelectFromCollection%2A>方法如果你要求用户以手动选择使用对话框中的 X.509 证书。

trans-unit.source: If no user interaction is required, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果无需用户交互是必需的使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="selectionFlag" /> parameter is not a valid flag.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="selectionFlag" /> 参数不是有效的标志。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="certificates" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificates" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="certificates" /> parameter is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificates" /> 参数无效。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。
